data.message: Are you going to use stevia in your drinks again? I liked coke life but I still couldn't bring myself to drink it as it still had a lot of sugar. Why not have one with 100%? I would drink that regularly...

replies.message: Hi Lauren, thanks for getting in touch. As a company, we are always looking at various ways which we can innovate our brands. Over the years we have introduced stevia to some of our well-loved brands, and whilst Coca-Cola Life has been discontinued we’ll continue to look at other ways we can use stevia in the future. Thanks
